attributes.action: Limit the benefits people can claim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Limit the benefits that people and families can claim upto 65% of the national average wage, this would ensure no one would be better off than the average working man.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Benefit-reforms/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
